sn20.10:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati.
sn20.10:4.5: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramati.
sn20.10:4.6: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn20.10:4.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn20.10:4.9: “idha, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu ativelaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati.
sn20.10:4.12: So bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno na viramatī”ti.
sn20.10:5.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, biḷāro sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre ṭhito ahosi mudumūsiṃ maggayamāno:
sn20.10:5.2: ‘yadāyaṃ mudumūsi gocarāya pakkamissati, tattheva naṃ gahetvā khādissāmī’ti.
sn20.10:5.3: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, mudumūsi gocarāya pakkāmi.
sn20.10:5.4: Tamenaṃ biḷāro gahetvā sahasā saṅkhāditvā ajjhohari.
sn20.10:5.5: Tassa so mudumūsi antampi khādi, antaguṇampi khādi.
sn20.10:5.6: So tatonidānaṃ maraṇampi nigacchi maraṇamattampi dukkhaṃ.
sn20.10:6.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena, anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā, asaṃvutehi indriyehi.
sn20.10:6.2: So tattha passati mātugāmaṃ dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā.
sn20.10:6.3: Tassa mātugāmaṃ disvā dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti.
sn20.10:6.4: So rāgānuddhaṃsena cittena maraṇaṃ vā nigacchati maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
sn20.10:6.5: Maraṇañhetaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
sn20.10:6.6: Maraṇamattañhetaṃ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ yadidaṃ aññataraṃ saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
sn20.10:6.9: ‘rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitāya vācāya rakkhitena cittena, upaṭṭhitāya satiyā, saṃvutehi indriyehi gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā’ti.
